attributes.action: Lower insurance prices for 17-25 year olds in the UK
attributes.background: Insurance is to expensive to pay without jobs or any financial help

rejection.details:
The Government and Parliament aren't directly responsible for the cost of insurance in the UK. We're not sure what action you would like the Government to take to decrease the cost of insurance for young people, or what kinds of insurance you would like the Government to take action on.

If you're concerned about the cost of car insurance for young people, you may want to sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/166847
